attributes.action: make a Rap video with HipHop megastar Colin Powell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the country is going to pot with children stabbing other children, videos of happy slapping being uploaded to YouTube, whole chickens being twice as expensive as last year, petrol pricing being absolutely nuts and of course the financial crisis, it's time to get GeeBrown to rap with Colin Powell.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
